Html:
Hi guys, I'm new on this forum and on WPF application as well.
I tried all day long to find some sample or someone that had the same problem I have, but it was useless.

Can someone show me how to add markers and routes with GMaps.NET for WPF.

I tried a lot of things like:

GMapMarker mroute = new GMapMarker(l);
mroute.Route.Add(l2) ;
mroute.RegenerateRouteShape(meuMapa);
meuMapa.Markers.Add(mroute);

where meuMapa is my GmapControl, l and l2 is my PoingLatLng

I am using GMapProviders.GoogleMap.
check the demo source, it is here for a reason ;}
